question: Pooja Ghatkar is associated with which sports?
explanation: Pooja Ghatkar from India, the former Asian champion, has won the bronze in the womenâ€™s 10 metre air rifle event in the 2017 International Shooting Sport Federation (ISSF) World Cup at the Karni Singh Shooting Range in New Delhi. Ghatkar shot 228.8 score in the final to finish third.
